Package com.distrimind.bouncycastle.crypto.macs

Class Zuc256Mac

java.lang.Object
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.crypto.macs.Zuc256Mac
All Implemented Interfaces:
Mac
public final class Zuc256Mac extends Object implements Mac
Zuc256 Mac implementation. Based on https://www.is.cas.cn/ztzl2016/zouchongzhi/201801/W020180126529970733243.pdf
